vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Manasseh living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at 1Ch.7.19;
son of: Shemida (H8061);
brother of: Ahian (H0291), Shechem (H7928H) and Aniam (H0593)
§ Likhi = "learning"
son of Shemida and grandson of Manasseh
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Semidá; tribu de Manasés
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
利克希 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "學習"
示米大的兒子, 瑪拿西的孫子 (代上 7:19)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
利克希 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "学习"
示米大的儿子, 玛拿西的孙子 (代上 7:19)
